snippet: A federal judge has denied a request to block discharge proceedings of a Marine who faces being kicked out of the military and losing benefits for criticizing President Obama on Facebook.
abstract: Federal Judge Marilyn Huff denies a request to block discharge proceedings of Sgt Gary Stein, who faces being kicked out of the military and losing benefits for criticizing Pres Obama on Facebook.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has denied a request to block discharge proceedings of a Marine who faces being kicked out of the military and losing benefits for criticizing President Obama on Facebook.

headline.main: California: Judge Will Not Halt Discharge Process Against Marine
headline.print_headline: California: Judge Will Not Halt Discharge Process Against Marine

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
